abstract: Vanessa Friedman On The Runway column celebrates life and career of late New York Times photographer Bill Cunningham, referred to by many as 'father of street style.'

headline.main: Bill Cunningham Looked Past the Runway to Capture Modern Identity

snippet: Bill was among the first to recognize the value of what people wore in their everyday life, and he created an invaluable portrait of society.
lead_paragraph: Bill was among the first to recognize the value of what people wore in their everyday life, and he created an invaluable portrait of society.
